## Data Description

This data set contains information about the locations in NYC where individuals can get a flu shot.

```{r}
flu_vax = 
  GET("https://data.cityofnewyork.us/resource/w9ei-idxz.csv") %>% 
  content("parsed")

view(flu_vax)
object.size(flu_vax)
```

Tidy the set

```{r}
flu_vax_tidy = 
  flu_vax %>% 
  select(objectid, facility_name, walk_in, insurance, children, borough, zip_code, latitude, longitude) %>% 
  mutate(borough = str_to_title(borough))
```

Graph it up

```{r}
vax_map = 
  flu_vax_tidy %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = longitude, y = latitude, color = borough)) +
  geom_point()

vax_map
```

Rad.
